thread.title: Oman Handball Association to sign partnership deal with Zubair Corporation
thread.title_full: Oman Handball Association to sign partnership deal with Zubair Corporation

author: muscatdaily@apexmedia.co.om (Muscat Daily News)
title: Oman Handball Association to sign partnership deal with Zubair Corporation
text:
Oman Handball Association to sign partnership deal with Zubair Corporation October 08, 2015 
The Oman Olympic Committee's (OOC) endeavour to strengthen the partnership between the private sector and the national sports associations got yet another boost on Wednesday with the OOC announcing that a deal will be signed between the Oman Handball Association (OHA) and Zubair Corporation. 
The formal ceremony will be held at the OOC headquarters on October 11. 
The OOC project named 'Sports for Development' kicked off last month with the signing of an agreement between Omantel and the Oman Volleyball Association (OVA). 
Khalid al Zubair, the OOC chairman, said, “The initiatives constitute part of the objectives and the vision of the OOC in the field of sports marketing. 
“We hope to consolidate the existing relationship between the private sector and the OOC and boost the partnership to new levels for the benefit of sports in the sultanate.” 
The OOC is expected to announce a series of deals in the coming months with other private sectors and national associations. Similar content
